meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the October 10, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing and the October 24, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Planned Development District for agricultural and retail uses on property zoned an R-10(A) Single Family District.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to and expansion of Planned Development District No. 456.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a mini-warehouse on property zoned an MU-2 Mixed Use District.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for an MU-3 Mixed Use District on property zoned Planned Development District No. 69.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a TH-3(A) Townhouse District on property zoned an LO-1 Limited Office District.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for vehicle display, sales, and service.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a microbrewery.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for an amendment to Tract II within Planned Development District No. 234.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Under Advisement
agenda_items.description: An application for an MF-1(A) Multifamily Subdistrict.
